Earlier I had given 1 star because my refund of ₹546.75 was not processed and Zomato support only gave bot replies. After continuous follow-ups, public posts, and even mentioning legal action, I finally received my refund. But the process was very frustrating: Initially, Zomato refunded only ₹226.75 and forced ₹300 as promo credit. Only when I refused and demanded legal action, they converted the promo into actual refund. In the end, I still received ₹20 less without any clear explanation.
